metadataMetric.description: The first time the user has clicked to collapse the video

Total number of ad request that were eligibile for the OpenX exchange and passed OpenX traffic quality filters.
The number of times the user has clicked to collapse the video
The number of times the user has clicked to expand the video
Total number of impressions served.

The first time the video has been started
The first time the user has viewed the companion banner
Total number of bids that won in the OpenX exchange by having the highest bid and bidding above the floor price. To find the total number of impressions served, please refer to marketImpressions.

The video has played through its third quartile (75% completion)

Total publisher revenue for billable impressions.
Total number of ad request sent by the publisher to be monetized by OpenX.

metadataDimensions.description: Height of the ad in pixels
adWidthxadheight of the ad in pixels
Width of the ad in pixels
The industry category of the brand served for the impressions.
ID for the winning buyer of the auction provided by RTB response.
Name of the buyer mapped via the ID provided by RTB.
Category of the content on the page as classified by OpenX.
Subcategory of the content on the page as classified by OpenX.
Day for when the ad request transaction occurred in ISO 8601 format.
Determines the source of the winning deal. Possible values are : RTG, PMP, DIDIE, or empty string
OpenX ID associated with the entity or DSP that submits bids in the OpenX ad exchange.
Demand Partner name associated with the entity or DSP that submits bids in the OpenX ad exchange.

DistributionChannel implementing class with the following legal values: 
 Site
 App
 Dooh
Hour for when the ad request transaction occurred in ISO 8601 format.
Indicator that video offered has opt-in video designation. This is set using the Video targeting.

Media Subtype Object implementing class with the following legal values: 
 Audio 
 Video 
 Display
Unique identifier for an app.
Name of the App
App store such as itunes or android where the app was installed.
Mobile SDK platform for the app
Brand ID of the winning brand. They are OpenX brand ids.
Name of the winning brand.
Data center for the ad request.
The domain the ad would be served on.
PMP deal type enum key
OpenX ID for the publisher.
Name of the publisher's account.
OpenX ID for the ad unit.
Name of the ad unit
Currency code determined by the publisher and used for publisher monetary values.
Platform Name (Instance) for the publisher.
Supported bid response permitted by the video. Key for Protocols are per OpenRTB specifications.
OpenX ID for the site.
Name of the site.
List of API frameworks supported separated by commas. Key for API Framework are per OpenRTB specifications.
Playback method permitted by the video separated by commas. Key for Playback Methods are per OpenRTB specifications.
Hour for when the ad request transaction occurred.
User's browser where the impression would be served.
Manufacturer of the device the impression would be served on.

userDeviceType is an integer value corresponding to IAD AdCom 1.0
 List:Device Types with the following legal values 
 1: mobile/tablet 
 2: personal computer 
 3:connected TV 
 4: phone 
 5: tablet 
 6: connected device 
 7: set top box
Country of the end user viewing the inventory.
The operating system for the user's device.

Placement Subtypes - Video with the following legal values: 
 1: In-Stream 
 2: In-Banner 
 3: In-Article 
 4: In-Feed 
 5: Interstitial/Slider/Floating
